website_summaries.verdict: Nice comfort level for long distance trips. Extremely stable and durable design.
pros: Seating area can accommodate two adults and a child or a dog
Easy to use – aimed at beginners and recreational users
cons: Higher price than some other models because of two seats
Not much area for storing gear with two paddlers

customer_reviews.title: These are nice kayaks! We bought two for my husband for ...
customer_reviews.text: These are nice kayaks! We bought two for my husband for Father's Day and they're perfect for our family of four! Totally recommend! If you need paddles, we're really happy with. As far as car racks, we don't love what we bought. The kayaks are really solid and heavy, so the dual rack we got feels a bit flimsy for them. When you find a better solution, leave it in the comments for me. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2 adults and 55 lb dog
customer_reviews.text: My husband, myself, and our 55 lb dog fit in this. Seats are a little flimsy, but this is a great recreational kayak.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to the Malibu line
customer_reviews.text: We only buy Malibu kayaks for our vacation rental in Roatan and this one does not disappoint. Seems sleeker in the water than our older one. Rally nice colors, easy to spot in th water when u r snorkeling too. Arrived on time, in great condition. Don't know what is with th one we replaced - it just kept developing leaks. We ar still sold on th Malibu though.
customer_reviews.author: Doc M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kayak
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I bought this for kayaking in Puget Sound. It's solid, easy for two people to carry, stable, simple to set up, and has surprisingly comfortable seats.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Clapham

customer_reviews.title: Easy.. stable... Not heavy
customer_reviews.text: Like the Kayak. It's stable and easy to maneuver. Easy to get in and out of the water. East to put up on top of the Subaru on our Thule basket rack with Dock glide saddles. My first Sit On Top kayak. Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: tricitydmbfan

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I like the adjustable feet placement
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! I like the adjustable feet placement, so your height makes no difference.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Yote

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all around kayak.  Single or tandem
customer_reviews.text: Kayaking along coast in Sturgeon Bay, Wi. South of Channel. A fine craft when hitting heavier water between land points. I am 6' and 210 lbs. The seat/back-support is good should you have lower back problems. Have not needed to use scupper stoppers. Riding single with seat positioned in middle provides adequate ballast.
customer_reviews.author: w siegel

customer_reviews.title: Great tandem kayak for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great 2 person kayak. Tracks very well in rough water and is smooth with 2 people. No dry storage in kayak when you get it so need to do some extra work to get that but very solid for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Mason

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome kayak, good for double or single. I actually fish off it as well and use one of the back scupper holes to hold my rob upright. I got it for a steal too.
customer_reviews.author: Cmarm

customer_reviews.title: Good job
customer_reviews.text: Love it, stable, easy to track with one or two adults and room for gear. Seat rest could be more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Great stability
customer_reviews.text: Very stable and easy to get in and out of. Lightweight enough to load easily onto top of car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The kayak is great but the 4 holes without plugs meant that we ...
customer_reviews.text: The kayak is great but the 4 holes without plugs meant that we couldn't use it until we straightened this out with Amazon on the phone. It now works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I already recieved the kayak but it says it hasnt come.
customer_reviews.text: I have already recieved the kayak and I enjoy it. You might want to put it as sold.
customer_reviews.author: guven nuzun

customer_reviews.title: this is a great sit-on kayak
customer_reviews.text: As most of the reviews say, this is a great sit-on kayak. The seats are comfortable and it tracks well. My wife and I love it. It is a sit-on though, so you are not going to stay dry! And, has already been said, its heavy - a two person lift.
customer_reviews.author: Mr John Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Ordered new kayaks, received damaged kayaks
customer_reviews.text: I paid for new kayaks, but I received damaged kayaks. Disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: ajohagakure

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wife and I love this Kayak...it scoots across the water. Very well built and balanced. Highly recommend buying one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Ocean Kayak is perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: The Ocean Kayak is perfect for our needs. We take it to our local harbors and bays, as well as to Mammoth and June Lakes. It is easy to use, comfortable not too difficult to transport on the roof of our Expedition.
customer_reviews.author: Bacchus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! You can do tandem or move the seat to the middle for solo!
customer_reviews.author: Valeri K.

customer_reviews.title: Great kayak!
customer_reviews.text: Great kayak. Easy handling. One or two persons may operate easily!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Ottuso, M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Happiness on the Water
customer_reviews.text: We bought this kayak based on reading excellent reviews and they were accurate. We have rented kayaks for years and we were pleased to discover that this kayak was lighter weight than our rentals, and had great carrying handles, including side handles, which made hauling the boat through narrow spaces much easier. We were worried that we should have bought the extra long tandem, but this was really long enough. There was ample room for a 6' man and a 5'6" woman. The seats were comfortable, and seem like they will be very durable.
customer_reviews.author: fishpondfrog

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great kayak but cant really say anything bad yet because we haven't taken out on the lake yet.
customer_reviews.author: frustrated

customer_reviews.title: Good Time
customer_reviews.text: I chose this kayak because we had used one in the Bahamas. My wife , whose afraid of water, felt safe and comfortable using it. It is solid and easy to use. The weight does make it a challenge to put on top of a suv. There was a problem with the shipping, it arrived two weeks later then it was supposed to. All in all we have used it and had a good time paddling together.
customer_reviews.author: P J M.

customer_reviews.title: A Great kayak for the money, and the family
customer_reviews.text: You are out on a lake, or a coastal marsh... Holds you and your daughter, or even two if they aren't grown yet! Very, very stable. Rides high so little splash over (unless you do it on purpose). Very nice colors. It is a little heavy, but can be carried by one person. The only reasons for 4 stars vs 5 is that you will need to add your own gromitts and rigging.... But don't you want to do that anyhow? And oh yeah.... Amazon will bring it to your front door! Amazon or Amazingon? Yeah, time for a name change.
customer_reviews.author: jeeplandshark

customer_reviews.title: I originally bought a kayak from Costco and was happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought a kayak from Costco and was happy with it. my friend has this Malibu ocean tandem kayak and let me paddle it. Wow! What a difference. much lighter and faster and more comfortable seats. I returned the old one to Costco. I love Costco and their return policy :-) I'm so happy with my Malibu and get plenty of use here in sunny SD
customer_reviews.author: Zach Dow

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: No good water gets in and we get all wet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Malibu Two
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't look like picture. Suppose to be the multi color/Sunrise but it is mostly orange and no yellow.However the price was reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H. Swicord

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased 4 of these and all of them have cracked and thus leak, right beside where the front two drain holes are molded and open up on the bottom. Have tried plastic weld repairs, are now using a marine grade stop leak tape so we will see how that holds up but it is definitely a design flaw. They get two stars because they are stable and durable ...apart from this issue.
customer_reviews.author: PH

customer_reviews.title: I am soooooo happy with this kayak
customer_reviews.text: I am soooooo happy with this kayak! After a lot of research and reading all the great reviews, I finally went with this one. It is so stable, comfortable, and easy to maneuver. Excellent product!!
customer_reviews.author: Keri Chittick

customer_reviews.title: Great experience.
customer_reviews.text: I did my research and found the kayak I wanted. It was delivered to my doorstep (on time). Great experience.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M.

customer_reviews.title: only thing i did not like is its wait
customer_reviews.text: I had one but had to give it up do to living in a small home and no out side storage. you can stand up, lay in the shade. only thing i did not like is its wait.
customer_reviews.author: Chip Connell

product_meta.title: Ocean Kayak Malibu Two Tandem Sit-On-Top Recreational Kayak
product_meta.description: This popular tandem sit-on-top kayak, the Ocean Kayak Malibu Two, is perfect for affordable family adventure. Enjoy sun and surf with a friend or a furry companion with the kayak's three seating positions, which support solo, tandem, or tandem paddling with a child or pet. A pair of Comfort Plus seats provide four-way adjustability, generating a custom fit and greater slip prevention over molded seats. Patented overlapping foot wells allow center-seated paddlers to settle in and brace their feet comfortably. The open, sit-on-top hull makes it easy to get on and off the kayak and includes a pair of molded-in handles and skid plate. Maximum capacity of 425 pounds; measures 12 feet long and 34 inches wide. Lifetime warranty on the hull.
feature_bullets: Enjoy sun and surf with a friend or a furry companion with the kayak's three seating positions, which support solo, tandem, or tandem paddling with a child or pet.
A pair of Comfort Plus seats provide four-way adjustability, generating a custom fit and greater slip prevention over molded seats.
Patented overlapping foot wells allow center-seated paddlers to settle in and brace their feet comfortably.
The open, sit-on-top hull makes it easy to get on and off the kayak and includes a pair of molded-in handles and skid plate.
Maximum capacity of 425 pounds; measures 12 feet long and 34 inches wide. Lifetime warranty on the hull.
